text:
[Verse]
Neon signs they glow so bright
City streets alive tonight
People dance in flashing light
Echoes bounce from left to right

[Verse 2]
Midnight taxis passing by
In the mist the sirens cry
Billboards tall they touch the sky
Lost in dreams we wonder why

[Chorus]
City lights they never sleep
Secrets that we always keep
Underneath the moon so steep
Memories we can't delete

[Verse 3]
Concrete jungle full of dreams
From above the skyline gleams
In and out the traffic streams
Life is more than what it seems

[Bridge]
High above the skyline
Hopes and fears combine
In this endless grind
True love we will find

[Chorus]
City lights they never sleep
Secrets that we always keep
Underneath the moon so steep
Memories we can't delete
title: City Lights
